pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/git-status.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/git-status/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install git-status```#### Examples```python>>> import git_status>>> git_status.get(".") M path/to/modified A path/to/added D path/to/deleted R path/to/renamed ?? path/to/untracked````Status` class```python>>> status = git_status.Status(".")>>> status.A['path/to/added']>>> status.M['path/to/modified']>>> status.D['path/to/deleted']>>> status.R['path/to/renamed']>>> status.untracked['path/to/untracked']```

readme42.com
